PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-11122000-07-270,  ,  ,  CCRA, 
PrecisEnactment of the INDIAN SETTLEMENTS REMISSION ORDER (2000) which provides the benefits of relief from Income Tax and Goods and Services Tax (GST) to Indians, Indian Bands and qualifying Band Corporations on specified Indian Settlements that would be granted if those settlements were reserves.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 2000-0069 Publication Date: 2000-08-16
